messages.content: Dear Steven, When I was first elected in 1998, I was Manchester's youngest Councillor. My commitment to you and our area is as strong now as it was then, nearly twenty years ago.

issues.brexitEurope: stand up to the Government over a hard Brexit – leaving us with fewer jobs, rising prices and higher rents & mortgages.

housing.content: leaving us with fewer jobs, rising prices and higher rents & mortgages.

leaflet.personalStatement: I want to do so again. Our area needs an MP who will spend their time sticking up for South Manchester and not infighting within the party. I believe you deserve to know what kind of person you’re supporting if you back me – that’s why I’m submitting my CV to you.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Manchester Withington

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. This election is a clear choice between the Lib Dems and Labour. If you want an MP who will fight hard for you then vote for me on Thursday 8th June.
